eligibility.notes: 7-11 COD; opened ~16h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: Neutral
snadResult.reason: The buyer’s request to return the item is based on subjective dissatisfaction regarding gameplay (feeling it’s not the intended type of gameplay) rather than a material mismatch. The item is functioning as expected, and there’s no objective evidence of a difference. Therefore, this is classified as Neutral (SND-502).

primaryOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
primaryOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-14012
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The buyer’s request to return the item is based on subjective dissatisfaction regarding gameplay (feeling it’s not the intended type of gameplay) rather than a material mismatch. The item is functioning as expected, and there’s no objective evidence of a difference. Therefore, this is classified as Neutral (SND-502).
Decision: Neutral
Outcome: The dispute was resolved with the seller rejecting the return, resulting in the buyer receiving their full purchase price.
